content: Hi everyone, I have been trying to match hapi and fhir.core version, and what I have understood is that everything after org.hl7.fhir.core 5.4.1 is not completely compatible with hapi? Is this statement correct?

Nowhere :)
It was the result of my analysis and some code checking.

hapi-fhir currently has 5.4.0 as a dependency, for a new hapi-fhir release the hapi-fhir team updates to the latest org.hl7.fhir.core version (@James Agnew correct me if i'm wrong), so in-between releases you might get issues if the org.hl7.fhir.core has changes which are not compatible.
